Kendo.Mvc.UI.Fluent.ChartLegendLabelsBuilder

Defines the fluent interface for configuring the chart labels.

Methods

Font(System.String)

Sets the labels font

Parameters

font System.String

The labels font (CSS format).

Example (ASPX)

<% Html.Kendo().Chart()
    .Name("Chart")
    .Legend(legend => legend
        .Labels(labels => labels
            .Font("14px Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif")
        )
    )
    .Render();
%>

Color(System.String)

Sets the labels text color

Parameters

color System.String

The labels text color.

Example (ASPX)

<% Html.Kendo().Chart()
    .Name("Chart")
    .Legend(legend => legend
        .Labels(labels => labels
            .Color("Red")
        )
    )
    .Render();
%>

Template(System.String)

Sets the labels template.

Parameters

template System.String

The labels template.

Example (ASPX)

<% Html.Kendo().Chart()
    .Name("Chart")
    .Legend(legend => legend
        .Labels(labels => labels
            .Template("${TotalSales}")
        )
    )
    .Render();
%>
